name: com.frenzybyte.fluidfrenzy
description: Fluid Frenzy is an interactive GPU-accelerated fluid simulation and renderer designed specifically for use with Unity Terrain and Custom terrains. This project aims to provide developers with a powerful toolset to create realistic, fun, interactive and immersive fluid dynamics in their Unity projects.

samples.description: Fluid Frenzy contains five sample scenes to showcase the functionality and help with understanding how to work with the fluid simulation. You can import the samples using the Package Manager. To run the samples, open any of the scenes in the Samples~ folder and click play. Scenes can be loaded at runtime in the Scenes tab in the UI. See the documentation for more information.
